column8: Situated on the rooftop of the Eden hotel, this modern restaurant boasts enchanting views of the historic centre of Rome, from the Quirinale to St Peter’s. At the helm in the kitchen, Salvatore Bianco creates two imaginative tasting menus from which dishes can also be chosen à la carte style. A superb fine-dining experience overlooking the rooftops of Rome.
